entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI TOP 2001/2. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E65: TÁRKI TOP 2001/2. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:description: market positions of companies in the processing industry and their prospects in the short run; property relations, economic information, product profile, employment, rentability, market expectations, opportunities for taking loans, production, export turnover, import quality, transportation and invoicing practices, taxing, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: trade, industry and markets
income, property and savings
labour and employment
social stratification and groupings
business/industrial management and organisation
economic organization
survey data
time-series

The sample was selected using a simple random sampling process from the biggest 1501 export and production companies based on the most recent Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) registry. The dropped out addresses were replaced with supplementary addresses.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
